hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ -n "$BUILD_NM" ] [ -n "$BUILD_NUM" ] [ -n "$PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE" ]
echo "BUILD_NM=$BUILD_NM" echo "BUILD_NUM=$BUILD_NUM" echo "PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE=$PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE"
# [ -n "$BRANCH" ] # [ -n "$TIMESTAMP" ] # [ -n "$DISTRO" ]
FROM="/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/${BUILD_NM}/builds/${BUILD_NUM}/log" [ -f "$FROM" ]
# # echo "BRANCH=$BRANCH" # echo "TIMESTAMP=$TIMESTAMP" # # PUBLISH_BRANCH="" # PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP="" # # if [ "$BRANCH" == "master" ]; then # PUBLISH_BRANCH=$BRANCH # PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP=$TIMESTAMP # elif [ $(echo $BRANCH | grep '^[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][.][0-9][0-9][.][0-9]*$' ) ]; then # # Release tag 2018.10.1 -> r2018.10 # PUBLISH_BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | sed 's/\([0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][.][0-9][0-9]\).*/r\1/') # PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP=$BRANCH # elif [ $(echo $BRANCH | grep '^[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][.][0-9][0-9].[0-9]*b[0-9]*$' ) ]; then # PUBLISH_BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | sed 's/\([0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][.][0-9][0-9]\).*/m\1/') # PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP=$BRANCH # fi # # echo "PUBLISH_BRANCH=$PUBLISH_BRANCH" # echo "PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP=$PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP" # # Assertions, did we get a BRANCH we understand how to parse # [ -n "$PUBLISH_BRANCH" ] # [ -n "$PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP" ] # # PUBLISH_DISTRO_BASE=/export/mirror/starlingx/$PUBLISH_BRANCH/$DISTRO # PUBLISH_BUILD_BASE=$PUBLISH_DISTRO_BASE/$PUBLISH_TIMESTAMP # # echo "PUBLISH_BUILD_BASE=$PUBLISH_BUILD_BASE" # # PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE=$PUBLISH_BUILD_BASE/logs
mkdir -p $PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE \cp $FROM $PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE/jenkins-${BUILD_NM}-${BUILD_NUM}.log ~/bin/log2html $PUBLISH_LOGS_BASE/jenkins-${BUILD_NM}-${BUILD_NUM}.log
